auth.twoFactorDesc: Enter the 6-digit code from your authenticator app
auth.tradeNamePlaceholder: e.g. ABC Travel and Tourism Co. Ltd.
auth.termsPrefix: I have read and accept the
auth.acceptTermsRequired: You must accept the terms of service.
auth.noPasswordNote: Once your application is approved, you will receive an activation email to set your password.
auth.registrationPendingMessage: Your application has been successfully submitted. Our team will review it shortly.
auth.step1Review: Your application will be reviewed by our team
auth.step2Approval: You will be notified via email when approved
auth.step3Activation: An activation link will be sent to set your password
auth.registrationSuccess: Registration successful! Your account is pending approval. You will receive an email once approved.
auth.changePasswordRequiredDesc: You must change your password to continue.
auth.passwordRequirements: Minimum 12 characters, including uppercase, lowercase, number and special character.
auth.forgotPasswordDesc: Enter your email address and we'll send you a password reset link.
auth.passwordResetEmailSent: Password reset link has been sent to your email address. Please check your inbox.
auth.forgotPasswordError: Failed to send password reset request. Please try again.
auth.resetPasswordDesc: Create a new password for your account.
auth.passwordResetSuccess: Your password has been reset successfully. You can now login with your new password.
auth.resetPasswordError: Failed to reset password. The link may have expired.
auth.createHotelAccount: Apply to become a hotel partner
auth.createAgencyAccount: Apply to become an agency partner

profile.title: Profile
profile.name: Name
profile.passwordTooShort: Password must be at least 6 characters
profile.deleteAvatarConfirm: Are you sure you want to delete your profile picture?
profile.invalidImageType: Invalid file type. Only image files are accepted.
profile.cropInfo: Drag to position, use controls to zoom and rotate. Click Save when done.

notifications.title: Notification Preferences
notifications.description: Choose which notifications you want to receive

twoFactor.title: Two-Factor Authentication
twoFactor.description: Protect your account with Google Authenticator or similar app
twoFactor.scanQRCode: Scan the QR code below with your authenticator app
twoFactor.enterVerificationCode: Enter the 6-digit code shown in the app
twoFactor.disableWarning: This will reduce your account security. Enter your verification code to continue.

sessions.terminateConfirm: Are you sure you want to terminate this session?
sessions.terminateOthersConfirm: Are you sure you want to terminate all other sessions?
